snippet: The loud defenders of the Police Department’s Muslim surveillance operation should not drown out reasonable criticisms.
abstract: Editorial scores New York City Mayor Michael Bloomberg and Police Commissioner Raymond Kelly for their defensive and hostile reactions to the disclosure of constitutionally suspect surveillance of law-abiding Muslims in the New York City metropolitan area; warns protests should not be so loud as to drown out reasonable criticisms.
lead_paragraph: The loud defenders of the Police Department’s Muslim surveillance operation should not drown out reasonable criticisms.
